Title: Directs the department of public service, in conjunction with other agencies to commission a study on the utilization of directional noise reduction optimization technology for wind turbines in New York state
Summary: Directs the department of public service, in conjunction with the New York state energy research and development authority, and the power authority of the state of New York to commission a study on the utilization of directional noise reduction optimization technology for wind turbines in New York state.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the department of public service, New York state energy research and development authority, and the power authority of the state of New York to commission a study on the utilization of directional noise reduction optimization technology for wind turbines in New York state
